metadata.title: CVE-2024-29203 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: TinyMCE is an open source rich text editor. A cross-site scripting (XSS)vulnerability was discovered in TinyMCEâ€™s content insertion code. Thisallowed `iframe` elements containing malicious code to execute wheninserted into the editor. These `iframe` elements are restricted in theirpermissions by same-origin browser protections, but could still triggeroperations such as downloading of malicious assets. This vulnerability isfixed in 6.8.1.

criterions.comment: tinymce package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
